thread.title: Google site search is on the way out. Now what?
thread.title_full: Google site search is on the way out. Now what?

author: Paul Shapiro
title: Google site search is on the way out. Now what?
text:
With Google sunsetting its site search product, many companies are wondering where to turn for this functionality; columnist Paul Shapiro provides some alternatives.

Please visit Marketing Land for the full article.
